phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
The One I have Set My Heart On
Finral Roulacase, a member of the Black Bulls Magic Knights Squad, was troubled.
It was a very important matter.
Finral's troubles had nothing to do with a mission...
A mixer, meaning a gathering between men and women.
It is a dinner intended to help men and women get acquainted.
When I set this up, three girls agreed to come, and that is great!
But the problem is who else I am going to bring.
Asta's a delight, so I am bringing him for sure.
This is what truly makes a man!
I know there are girls who like delinquents, but...
This is what truly makes a man!
Magna's too much of a delinquent.
He would just scare them off.
with my life-size statue of Marie.
It feels like you are right next to me!
Ah, you truly are an angel!
Even if I took him to a mixer...
Marie's more of an angel than any of you.
I want to have a mixer with a hundred Maries.
Marie was already an angel before she was even born.
He would definitely scare them away!
I heard that you were having a mixer.
You want me to come with you?
Yeah, I have no idea what Gordon's thinking, so that is not happening.
You do not need to hold back.
It is not as if I do not like girls.
It might be fun to bring Charmy along, since she is sort of like a mascot character.
Excuse me, could I get seconds?
It is only been five minutes since we opened,
but we are out of ingredients, so we must close for the day.
The mixer'd be over in five minutes!
At least, that is what I assume would happen.
Maybe I could go all-out and invite Yami...
I am sure there are girls who like older guys.
Yami does hate gaudy types, though.
Why the hell are you three dressed like that, huh?
Are not you showing too much skin?
What if you catch a cold?
Put something warm over your stomachs!
Well, Luck looks decent, so I am sure things will work out.
So, what is a mixer, anyway?
All right, it looks like we are all set.
Should we go dressed like this?
We have to make sure they know that we are Magic Knights.
Magic Knights are the most admired figures in the Clover Kingdom, after all.
I promise I will not get in the way...
City in the Common Realm: Nean
When I heard they were going to a mixer,
I was so worried, I ended up following them.
Why are they going to a mixer?
This is the problem with lowly fools.
I-I mean, it is not as if I like that muscle-brained shrimp or anything!
I do not care who he hangs out with or what happens after that!
Wait, who am I even making excuses to?!
I am pretty sure it was somewhere around here.
Looks like we all have our drinks, so let us get right to the introductions!
I will go ahead and start.
Finral Roulacase 21-Year-Old Member of the Black Bulls From Touta
I am 21 years old and from Touta!
I am Finral Roulacase, the spatial magic user from the Black Bulls!
These are freshly picked moon blossoms.
Please take them as a token of our friendship.
These only bloom at night on Mount Anahu, right?
I am finally going to get a girlfriend!
But for that to happen, I need both Asta and Luck to do their best.
Am I just supposed to say what I like?
Luck Voltia 18-Year-Old Member of the Black Bulls From Ibon
I am Luck Voltia, and I am 18 years old.
I am from Ibon and belong to the Black Bulls.
My hobbies include fighting tough enemies in bloody, mortal combat!
Is not fighting for your life a wonderful phrase?
A manly man should probably talk about his dreams.
Asta 15-Year-Old Member of the Black Bulls From Hage Village
I am a member of the Black Bulls!
Um... my dream is to become the Wizard King someday!
He is just a kid, anyway.
I mean, I heard they would be Magic Knights,
but they just had to be Black Bulls, the lowest of the low?
And if he is from Hage, is not he a peasant?
I would never go out with any of these guys if they did not earn more than me.
And if they are younger, shorter, and socially beneath me...
This seems to be going south.
We have introduced ourselves, so now it is your turn, girls!
We are passing the baton to you!
I work at a dressmaker shop.
I am Helene, and I work as a hairdresser.
Wow, so you all have solid jobs.
Say, I would love to hear about your work.
I would love it if you made some clothes for me.
What do you think would look good on me?
Maybe you could cut my hair sometime.
I have been thinking of changing up my hairstyle.
Could I eat at your place sometime?
I need to think of something they would be interested in!
W-Want to hear about the Magic Knights?
Well, I use spatial magic to go to all sorts of places.
Something I have done recently at my job...
I do not think I have done anything lately other than move Yami around.
Tell them something interesting you have done at work lately.
Helene and the other girls really want to know.
The other day, we ran into a group of ten bandits...
I could have easily killed them all, but I just broke three of their bones.
Oh, and when I fought this mage, I
Now, go on and eat up, my boy!
I would love to hear what Asta's been up to!
You protected the people of the royal capital, did not you?
Oh, you mean the incident the other day?
Asta worked really hard and got promoted!
We just need to keep taking the conversation in this direction!
Well, I did not manage to protect myself.
They put three holes in me.
Hey, do not poke at them.
I should have known a mixer would not work with these two!
I heard them mention a mixer, so I ended up tagging along.
But thankfully, it does not seem to be going well.
I do not care what happens to Shrimpsta!
So you know about that huge incident at the capital the other day?
I just happened to be on bodyguard duty for a VIP in the capital that day,
and just happened to defeat a number of the intruders.
They gave me an exceptional promotion
and bumped me up to Intermediate Magic Knight all at once!
It is a such a hassle, really.
It is not like I am even that talented.
Maybe I am a little intoxicated...
Oh, and you were looking at a dirty mag during all that, right?
Hey, what are you talking about?
You guys nervous to be around us?
You do not have to be so nervous.
He just squeezed lemon all over the fried chicken without asking first.
What the heck is this mixer from hell?
I am pretty sure I have seen this guy before.
To think that my bronze magic would be so formidable.
Oh, so that is the kind of magic you use when you cut hair.
It does not take much magic, but you need really good control!
He has such a cute smile, but there is danger behind it.
I think I might like that gap more than I want to admit.
I think I am starting to like bad boys.
Hey, could you show me your magic, too, Luck?
It is a bit cramped in here, so let us go outside.
And the sunrise looks really beautiful from there.
I will take you there with my spatial magic sometime.
Want to go camping with me?
I think I might like that.
Excuse me, could we get another drink?
He is a bit gaudy and not really my type, but he is the best out of the three.
He seems like a noble, and spatial magic would be really handy.
Plus, he is considerate and kind.
Say, want to step out to the patio?
I guess I would not mind.
I was not sure how things would go for a second,
but I think things might just work out!
Why does this lady keep looking away and down?
Did I do something to make her mad?
I need to liven things up.
I am not really sure how, but I have to liven things up!
You do not have to force yourself to make small talk.
Erika told me that I should find a good guy for the sake
of my siblings, so I came along.
But this is not the real me, and I am too worried about my siblings at home.
So you live with your siblings?
I have three younger brothers and two younger sisters.
Oh, I have five siblings, too, though we are not related by blood.
I am not with them right now, but they are all a bunch of little brats.
They annoyed me sometimes, but we had so much fun.
We used to all sleep in the same bed.
Now that I am in the Magic Knights, I get my own room, so it is a little easier,
but not having those fidgety little brats sleeping next to me gets a bit lonely, too.
They can be a pain, but it gets lonely when they are not around!
And you can act like a dork in front of your friends,
but you always want to impress your siblings!
What do you think you are doing?
You just asked for a job out of the blue, so I hired you,
but then you blew away some customers!
Who do you think you are?
Come to think of it, you seem like a big sister, Rebecca.
You definitely do not seem like the oldest, though.
I have one brother who is the same age as me named Yuno...
You look like you are having fun, o great Magic Knight.
Are not you a little small to be one?
Are you really a Magic Knight?
If a little twerp like you got in, I could probably get in, too.
Yeah, I am surprised I made it in, too.
And being out with a flashy little thing like this?
Bet you are desperate to catch yourself a Magic Knight, are not ya, missy?
Pretty sure I have seen you somewhere before.
Oh, you are the girl who works at the local restaurant,
always carrying a kid on your back and working until you are drenched in sweat.
That must mean your man walked out on you.
Well, then, of course you would like to get yourself a Magic Knight
If you want a man that much,
I do not know what your deal is, mister, but do not judge people by their appearances!
You do not know anything about her, do you?
What kind of amazing magic are you going to show me, widdle Magic Knight?
A Magic Knight that cannot use magic?
What kind of lousy joke is that?
That was a waste of time.
Let us get more drinks somewhere else.
Let us get out of here!
He is a bit short, but he is actually...
Hey, Asta... D-Do you have anyone that you like?
There is somebody I have got my heart set on!
I am sure she is a wonderful person.
I wish you both the best.
Hey, come by my restaurant sometime.
You can play with my siblings.
Then... could... could that mean... mean m-m-m-me...
It is not like I th-think... anything... anything of...
Sister, we spent so many years together in Hage.
One day, I will become the Wizard King and come for you!
Just because I am supporting him does not mean I am going to give up.
By the way, what is the point of a mixer, anyway?
Apparently he threw some drunkard to the ground.
If Gordon, Grey, and Sekke Went to a Mixer Together
If Gordon, Grey, and Sekke Went to a Mixer Together.
I am so happy to be at a mixer with people as cute as you two.
I will write you a letter.
I am going to become the Wizard King!
I am not going to lose to anyone!
I will prove that even peasants can move up the ranks!
Not giving up is my magic!
